title: I highly recommend
text: For 60 dollars this is incredible, so happy with it, only thing is, when you put the laser pointer on pet mode and get out of the app to do something else on your phone, the laser stops but the camera still moves in pet mode, also the audio isn’t amazing, but still with those odds I would still highly recommend. My cats are in love and so am I with this product so far.

title: App and camera have worked great until leap year
text:
Both the app and the camera have worked great for a few years now with minimal problems.
My C34S-X4 camera either stopped writing to my TF card (when. motion detected) or the App doesn’t recognize anything since February 29th (which happened to be a leap year day).  I’ve rebooted and tried deleting some of the previously recorded files to free up space- but still can’t get it to start recording again.
The App “calendar” does not show any dates after February 29, 2020 as being accessible.
Seems to be an App problem/bug as the camera continues to work great and I can take snapshots and record video to the system album etc without a problem.
Would love a solution to be able to continue to give good reviews for the products.

title: Notification stopped working in last update
text:
I confirmed all the notification settings are set correctly. All other apps provide notifications as expected. Tested Eye4 app on another iPhone with same result. All iPhones at most recent version of iOS. Updated all camera firmware. Removed Eye4 app and reinstalled. Reset all settings in iPhone>settings>general>reset. Issue persists.

Notifications feature is the most important to me as I use it for deliveries etc. The app is now almost useless to me. It does have the ability to email motion capture notification and that seems to be working ok. So for now I have set up a mail rule on my computer to alert me instead of using the Eye4 app for notifications. This is a poor work around and inconvenient enough for me to consider replacing the cameras with another brand. I’ll reconsider the rating after issue is resolved and an update is released in a timely manner.

title: Require Location permission msg each cam. No thanks.
text: The last two releases they are trying to make you accept your location so they know where you’re at each time you view your cam on your phone. What is the purpose of a cam if you know where people are? They need to please remove that message once a person clicks cancel until a reboot or never again. I started purchasing other cams for this reason. If I select cancel, do not show that message again until I reboot or never again until I upgrade. Thank you.

title: Unacceptable
text: If I had known how poorly made the software for my “VStarcam” was, I never would have bought it. One of the only reasons I did buy it was for the ability to pan vertically and horizontally, however, it only lets you do so in “cruise” modes that are impractical and cause the app to crash. On top of this, the bitrates are so poor that my video feed lags by about a minute, rendering the camera pretty useless for home security. Please don’t give me some generic advice because I’ve already updated to the latest firmware at the time of writing, and there is ample bandwidth on my network. Just have your developers fix the ongoing software issues, because right now this product just feels like a scam.

title: Zoom bar
text:
The new update applies a (zoom status bar) on my screen in the right side. When holding my phone in the horizontal position it’s in the way of my view and why do you need this on this view anyway, you can just use your fingers to zoom in and out. 
In the vertical position I thought it was just fine. Due to being not being in the cameras view at all, it’s next to the control pad joystick for moving the camera completely off the view screen. But when moving the phone horizontally that zoom bar, shouldn’t be there at all. Thanks

title: Building an Encrypted Connection
text:
I’ve had a few of these cameras for a few years and until recently they have worked great.  But since the last software upgrade, all I get now is a message on all my cameras that it is Building an Encrypted Connection.  Maybe once out of 50 attempts of opening and closing the software will it finally connect after a few minutes of waiting.  

It’s unfortunate as the cameras performed well for the price but the technical and customer support is not existent so I can not get anyone to help resolve this.  After a few hundred dollars towards cameras it disappointing.

I would not recommend these cameras unless they fix this issue.

title: Love the App …. BUT!
text: Please remove the “Zoom Slide Bar” on the screen! I hate that thing. It’s easy enough to just pinch and zoom. I liked the screen view just the way it was. Thanks!

title: Needs some work
text: It works ok most of the time but alert function only works while you are on live cam, cameras go offline once in awhile and you have to unplug them and plug them back in sometimes you have to delete them and add them back on.  If wasn’t for these issues I would give them a 5 star, but if you are out of town no way to reset them. I have 6 of these around my house so it is not just a isolated issue cause I have them all at sometime go off line

title: App closes out
text: The app works great for the first camera I bought, bought a second smaller one and the app closes out every time I try to connect it to new vstar camera. I made sure my phone and app were up to date and made sure I’m on the correct WiFi, still nothing, I tried to connect wirelessly both ways and still nothing. This camera has no LAN port and must be connected wirelessly, which would be easy if the app didn’t close out every time! 2 stars only bc it was working before,

title: Needs work
text: The motion alerts in the app do not work. When you pull up an alert it just shows the camera in real time, no recordings. You would need to be watching your phone and see something in real time for the alert function to work. Without this, you would have to wait until you are home to pull SD card to see what triggered an alert, and by that time it could be too late if something was happening. Hoping it gets fixed, would be 4-5 stars if did.

title: Cloud storage!
text: Cloud storage stoped working after I updated the application. It used to play past videosand give me notifications if the alarm was triggered but now it’s completely useless on that part. The live feed still works but it doesn’t serve the purpose. Please do something about this issue and make it quick.

title: Good camera bad app.
text:
I have 2 cameras. I have to constantly restart one of them. This process cannot be done remotely. You have to physically unplug and Re plug or hit the reset button which is high up and out of reach. The cameras have a good picture. I was planning to expand to 4 cameras but decided to put on hold due this very annoying issue with unending initializing and reboots.
Update: Lesson learned. If you decide to buy security cameras, check and see what the APP 
Ratings are. If I’d would’ve done that a would not be stuck with 2 cameras that are virtually 
Useless.

title: Bad iCloud service
text:
The cloud service sometimes records and sometimes it doesn't. I did not set an alarm schedule so it should work all the time. When i go to replay the video there is at least 12 hours of time that is not recorded. I have tried contacting customer service and nobody responds. They give one solution that does not work. 

Also, one of my cameras does not send me notifications anymore. Not sure why. Very frustrating when you can never chat with customer service because of time zone difference.

title: Why is everything this product does so LOUD
text:
Quick setup while finding a device has this awful, piercing sound, and the app resets the volume high whenever it plays it.  Why?  Why ever do that?

The camera itself plays a voice track every 5 seconds when it’s not connected to Wi-Fi, or during initial setup.  Why?  Why so frequently?  Why not an indicator light like every other product in existence?

Incredibly low quality software and UX.

title: Great then not so great
text: I never had a problem until the most recent firmware update. The camera was by far my favorite out of several different ones I own. However, now after I close the app, the speaker no longer works making talking into the app useless. Unless this gets fixed, I’ll likely replace the camera with a different brand as this feature was one of the main reasons I purchased this camera. Bummer.

title: Nonfuncting device
text:
I agree with the previous review. It worked excellent for the first few months. Then kept going offline, said someone else is logged on to my camera (which is frightening) and saying it is “building an encrypted...”.  So I just turned it off. I hope I didn’t waste hundreds of dollars for nothing.  Customer service doesn’t work on the system

I sent them a screen shot saying someone else was logged into my device yet they say it cannot happen.

title: Great at first, then came disappointment.
text:
It was a struggle to get the camera set up and working, but once it did I loved the camera and it made me feel safe and at ease knowing I can check in on my cats when I’m away doing errands. 

After a week the iCloud stopped recording my videos, and I emailed for support and no luck. I decided to reboot it all myself and now I cannot get it hooked up to my WiFi and working again. 

It has became very frustrating especially when you google and barely any help or suggestions come up as well. 

Was thinking to get a second camera when I was loving it and now I think otherwise, which makes me sad since I also found it to be a great secuirty camera as well.

title: Review update
text:
All of a sudden I can no longer view my camera unless I’m home. I’ve tried updated the software but won’t let me. I’ve tried deleting and reading but it won’t  even let me add. Just keeps saying recognition failed.  
Update. Clearly you never took the time to read my review cause if you did you can see that it says that the firmware won’t update. I have tried numerous times. I even deleted and tried to read add but you didn’t read that either.

title: Overall glitchy
text: An okay app for being free but it has lots of glitches. Ever since the latest update, it asks to bind email every time I open the app. I can enter my email address a million times but it never emails me or makes the notification stop appearing. Daylight savings time ended today (November 4) and there is no way to turn the time back on the cameras and it hasn’t updated automatically.

title: Junk
text: They have to be taken back down about ever 3 months it looses WiFi and with no way to get back into the WiFi section you have to take down and reprogram they need to put a place to reconnect to WiFi this is a big problem for me it takes a whole day to do this I’ve done it three times since I have had them and you have a hard time sending a review all names are taken

title: Building an encrypted channel...non-stop
text:
The software for this app is awful. I have the most up to date version of the software (5.2.6). This problem won’t go away. I’ve tried updating the firmware on the camera and still this won’t work. I used to love this camera but now I want to throw it away. I’ve told many people about it which has led to the purchase of 5 cameras between my friends and family. I’m starting to regret that recommendation. 

PLEASE FIX YOUR SOFTWARE!!!

title: Keeps on crashing!!!!!!!!!!!!!
text:
The latest 2 updates, keeps on crashing on my 2 iPads. Pls fix!

Thanks for the reply. Said to uninstall and reinstall since there’s a new update. Did that. But then again, still the same. Tried on both iPads, failed! Can we choose the previous versions instead coz the the more you guys update it, the more it’s getting worse. 
Well, i still hope you guys can still FIX it!

title: Peace of Mind
text: This wireless video camera is definitely an awesome investment. Now I can monitor my Mother and pets when they r home alone. I don’t have to worry and I can talk to her and hear her responses.  So very Happy with this product.

title: Unable to access my cloud
text: I was able to access my cloud until yesterday I did get a message saying my freezer I was going to expire on April 16 and now I can’t even get any of my videos that are on the cloud and I need one of them to be able to get in order to give to police for reason and nothing.

title: RrDc
text: I like this device so far so good it stays monitoring for me that’s the option I choose because I like 24 hour servalance but there are other options

title: Not reliable
text: everytime there is an update to IOS, these folks are the last to upgrade their app, so your camera goes offline for weeks.  Steer clear of these cams.

title: Excellent
text: It’s just excellent. You can use to watch the kids, to keep an eye on the house when you are away and other things.

title: Very easy to set you works flawlessly
text: I have been using this product for a while and I am very satisfied

title: Great Camera
text:

Love your camera and software 
Only problem can not get it to work with my windows 10 
Tried BlueStacks and it is the only program for Eye4 does not work 
Other than that Love your cameras and software

title: Not great...
text: When it works, which is quite rare is fine. It freezes a lot, goes offline like every day and it has to be unplugged and plugged back in to make it work. Used to work a lot better but it seems to get worse with every update.

title: How it work

title: one little bug

Cameras are frozen for weeks now. Terrible, terrible customer service!!!!!!  Chinese thieves make Chinese crap!!! Never again!!! Last of anything I buy that’s made in China!!!

title: Works great!!!
text: Im very satisfied with this product! When I'm away from home I can interact with my cat so he's not soo lonely.

title: Picture is great and clear WHEN IT WORKS!

title: Best Camera system

title: Very easy

title: Works but always crash

App crashing when trying to open it. It was working fine before the 27 July update. After updating the app.... I can't open it anymore. It's closing automatically.

I'm using iPhone 5
iOS 10.3.3

Please fix ASAP. Thanks.

Developer fixed the problem. It's working fine now.

I tried to register with that mail, it says email already registered.
 See the loop?

Try another cam, I beg you.

title: Used to work till I upgraded to U-verse AT&T internet
text: I own 4 of these cameras that use this app and loved them. The XuCoo kind. My mother has full blown ALS and is on a ventilator, feeding tube, the works. I got these cameras because I could check them from work and make sure she was doing well. After an issue with a fall that caused a broken femur and shoulder they were a must have. However, last month, I upgraded my internet from Time Warner/Spectrum to AT&T u-verse. When I tried to put the cameras on the new wifi network, it told me they weren't capable of using 5G. So now they are utterly useless. Make sure you do not get cameras that use this app if your internet is too fast. I didn't even realize you could have too fast of an internet for something.

title: Let's see how many times EyeCloud/Eye4 can screw up
text:
Once upon a time, there was EyeCloud.  I ran my home cameras through that app, it worked ok.  EyeCloud came out with an update that, basically, made everything not work.  No more EyeCloud.  

Switched over to using the Eye4 app.  I ran my home cameras through that app, it worked ok.  Eye4 came out with an update, that, basically, has made several things not work.  

Are these developers TRYING to make people get new systems...?  Because I can't fathom how they release updates with such massive bugs/problems in them.

title: Usable but not great
text:
Since you ship worldwide you should translate the app at least to English. Now most items not readable.
Also this app has a problem with tilt and shift support, camera goes not where you tell it, usually it goes ceiling if you just touch the screen.
Also position presets does nothing at all.
Vscam is much better.
Also this app hangs on iOS 6 when you try to add camera.

title: Motion detection doesn't work
text: The whole point of a security system is to know if there is any unusual movements and to be notified if there is, with this feature not working the whole system is useless!  Also you don't have an option to fast forward the video play... so you literally have to sit there and watch the playback in real time.  I tried importing the video from the SD card to my computer but the files are encrypted...again making the system useless.

title: Have issues ?
text: If your app is crashing after update , just delete the app and install it again; it seems like this version crashes if it is present data from an old version.

title: Easy 2 setup
text: Fastest setup ever.  I forgot to setup the wifi but that was a matter if just punching in the password and a fast automatic reboot. The app interface always lag on all p2p devices but it's better then most. On a tablet, rather then a smartfone, I would think it's easier to navigate the pan/tilt.

title: Mostly worthless
text: Half of the time the app either won't load the camera view. I updated the app yesterday, and I still have to shut down the app and open it back up several times before I can view anything. As far as features of the app, all the settings are written in broken English, so I can't understand anything to modify my settings. I could go on and on but this app has already wasted enough of my time. I have had nothing but trouble.

title: The alarm doesn't work, please fix!
text: The alarm worked on the previous version, but since the update this week, it doesn't work at all. I tried to activate every single option and it seems to be an issue with the update because it worked fine before that. I hope this is fixed asap because that is an important function of the app that I need back.

title: Horrible after update
text: This update is STILL awful! I wish I never updated this app 2-3 versions ago. Worse now that the language has no options. The cameras saved deletes itself again and again. Every time I use it the cameras are gone. Cameras tilt don't stay tilt. Once I awhile the cameras show up by itself. If I can rate it -5 stars I would!!!  If you are going to fix something, make it better or leave it as is. Don't update an app pretend you improved something.

title: Getting better
text: This interface for vstarcam is getting better with its latest revision. A very convenient way to keep track of up to four of your ipcams. Presets and icon approach have potential to make this app very simple for the average user. However IR control seems to have disappeared from earlier version.

title: Update Fails
text: As others are saying this update does not work. Updated and app closes when attempting to open. Same on both iPad and iPhone. Please fix!

title: Bad app, and bad recording, stuttering video

Hi developer, please could you make it as smooth as possible for the motion records, as well as enable it to record the sound once motion is detected? 
Why is it so stuttery and no sound enable in after motion was detected? 
Compared with Xiaoyi IP camera and the app, your app is really not user-friendly.
Don't tell me is your hardware issue by not enable to auto record with sound after motion is detected,and please smoother video please.!!!

title: Only works if my phone is on Wifi
text: This was good until I updated my phone! Now if I am using cellular data it crashes! Kinda the point in having it so I can us while I am gone. Very unhappy! I have these great cameras that I can only use when connected to wifi! but who gets wifi all the time??? Fix this please

title: Decent Works Good
text:
New update: figured out the intercom, works well, upgraded to 3 stars. 

Would be 4 stars with easier IR button. 

---------
Update:

I like the old version better. Before was able to Talk then quickly hit Listen. 

Now, I'm not sure what to do. Intercom, Talk, then Cancel then Listen??

So what took one click to do before now takes 3, and it makes having a convo with my Toddler impossible cause I can't do all 3 clicks fast enough before he starts talking.... :/

----

Decent,

Has some weird language wordings, but works and feature rich. 

Thanks.

----

title: Bad Update for 4.0
text: My wife and I use this as a monitor for watching our kids. With the new update, if one of us opens the app to look at the monitor, then the other cannot log in without kicking off the other. Please fix so we can open it simultaneously on our devices without being kicked off!

title: Needs improvement
text: The app concept is good, but has several problems: crashes all the time, the speaker doesn't work you have to restart the app every time you want to use it, the firmware upgrade of the cameras always has a problem. The app has many bugs that need to be fix ASAP

title: Won't connect
text: It was working fine for idk 4-5 months now it just won't connect to any of he camera in the house... it keeps saying connection failed or wifi configuration.. blah blah anyways waste of money now my return warranty was only for 30 days I'm stuck with a camera that doesn't work and have to buy a new one emailed them so many times never got responses

title: Did everything still doesn't work

title: Great cameras, horrible software

When the cameras work it's fantastic, the video quality is great even in very low light, but the software is simply terrible, I don't know why it's not all in English

Too bad because the cameras are pretty good. Would also be nice if the apps would allow camera with cell data but they don't.

title: Do not buy the camera or the app, unless you don’t mind the camera not connecting wirelessly
text: I wasted 60$ on the camera, because I was hoping to play with my dogs. Not only was the camera unable to attach to walls like the post on Amazon said, but the camera was not able to connect wirelessly to the WiFi. The setup was awful, trying to connect it with sound waves. The voice the camera uses is hard to tell what it’s saying. I tried connecting the camera via Ethernet chord (which wouldn’t work because the only one is in my office) and the camera finnaly connected to my phone. The app was slow to connect the the camera, and the inputs were slow. Awful experience, and I hope Amazon will let me return it.

text:
Fails With install of new app - occurs  constantly with release of updates. Just stop with updates your app team needs IT specialist that can write code. Constantly disappointed. By the way, did uninstall then install. 

With new update- unable to even log in to se my cameras. This problem is typical with their updates. Once they fix it ( could be a couple of weeks) and if it works fine for you, do not update to any of their newer versions.

Update: app doesn't let me log in and password retrieval does not work- also states their server has issues. * the older app on my other devices which I did not update work fine.

New update: app doesn't work with iOS 10. Developer needs to stay on top of things. This happens too often.

To the developers, without iOS 10 compatibility all of your products are utterly useless. It should be noted that a quality company that has multiple products that require an app for its functionality should put its resources into app development. This situation of nonfunctional system compatibility should not be tolerated- it says a lot about your company.

title: Terrible software for bad hardware.
text: I bought an IP Camera from Amazon and this is the companion app. Both are awful. This app lacks basic functionality, is very, very poorly translated from Chinese, crashes from specific button presses *and* crashes randomly. The wifi setup process simply didn't work as the app or the camera seemed about 10 seconds out of sync with each other. This happens often enough to time out processes that require device check in. I could go on. Don't buy a camera from this manufacturer and don't use this software.

title: Reall awful software
text: Bought the camera and software.  Full of mis-translations, broken code, and crashes.  Returned the camera after I realized how bad the software was.
